title: The Cat in the Wall: and Other Dark & Twisted Tales of Women in Strange Situations
description: A cat in the wall. A white rabbit waiting in the yard the night before Easter. Spirits that appear as mist. A mysterious lake where people swim in winter. In this quirky, dark and-at times-humorous collection of six short stories, the heroines grapple with madness, despair, betrayal, anger and vengeance while encountering these and other strange phenomena that blur the line between fantasy and reality.
author: Heather Nanni
